BEACH_PUNCH.name: Bennett's Beach Punch
BEACH_PUNCH.desc: a lovely drink for when you're on a boat. This recipe was meant to be made in the punch jug but it can be adapted.

RUM_COKE.name: Rum and Coke
RUM_COKE.desc: A classic drink, made with two great ingredients, which we like a lot and are very good together. I have never had a rum and coke and I don't know the recipe so I just made it up.

DEMO_1.name: Oops! all Alcohol
DEMO_1.desc: I dont know many recipes so this one isnt real. I'm just going to list a buynch of ingredients and really hope you don't try to mix them together because that might be really bad. Do not drink this recipe.

MIMOSA.name: Vodka Mimosa
MIMOSA.desc: A regular mimosa except its just vodka instead of champagne.
